name: Fillets of Sole In Herbed Butter
keywords: butter, fish, sole fillet, tarragon, main course
recipeIngredient: 1/4 teaspoon dried tarragon or 1/4 teaspoon ground fennel seed or 1 teaspoon lemon zest
Salt and freshly ground white pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: To make herb butter combine your choice of seasoning with soft butter and let stand for a few minutes.
In one or two large skillets melt as much of the butter as you wish until it sizzles. Quickly saute the fillets for a minute or two one each side.
Season with salt and pepper if desired.
